QuestData.Title: Report to Gila
QuestData.Description:
I was quite fortunate that King Mechagon found me worthy!
I will send my assistant Gila Crosswires ahead to Boralus to gather a new team. Meet up with her and help out as you can.
I will join both of you shortly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet up with Gila Crosswires in Boralus.
